WITH joined_table AS ( SELECT p.sequence product_sequence, p.product_imgurl product_imgurl, p.name name, p.price, p.point_accumulation_rate point_accumulation_rate, p.stock stock, p.sales_count sales_count, p.created_at created_at, a.sequence author_sequence, a.name author_name, pb.sequence publisher_sequence, pb.name publisher_name, c.sequence category_sequence, c.name category_name, REPLACE(p.name, ' ', '') AS name_without_blank FROM product p INNER JOIN author a ON p.author_sequence = a.sequence INNER JOIN category c ON p.category_sequence = c.sequence INNER JOIN publisher pb ON p.publisher_sequence = pb.sequence ), joined_table_with_review AS ( SELECT jt.*, COUNT(r.product_sequence) as review_count, COALESCE(AVG(r.rating), 0) as rating_avg FROM joined_table jt LEFT JOIN review r ON jt.product_sequence = r.product_sequence GROUP BY jt.product_sequence ) SELECT * FROM joined_table_with_review WHERE name_without_blank LIKE '%${keyword}%' OR author_name LIKE '%${keyword}%' OR category_name LIKE '%${keyword}%' OR publisher_name LIKE '%${keyword}%'
